CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 44 The active layer morphologies recorded are in good accordance with the J sc performance of the PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBBn
2. PC71BM
3. The active layer (implied, as the paragraph is about the morphologies of the active layer)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBBn
2. PC71BM

These are the material names explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 44 The active layer morphologies recorded are in good accordance with the J sc performance of the PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. active layer morphologies
2. J sc performance
3. PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices.

In this paragraph, "active layer morphologies" refers to the physical characteristics or shape of the active layer in a device. "J sc performance" is likely a measure of the electrical properties or efficiency of the device, specifically in relation to the J-V (current-voltage) curve. "PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices" are devices that are made using PffBBn and PC71BM as materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. active layer morphologies (refers to the physical properties of the active layer)
2. J sc performance (refers to the electrical property of the device)

The other entity "PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices" is not a material property, but rather a type of device made using certain materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| active layer morphologies |
| J sc performance |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 44 The active layer morphologies recorded are in good accordance with the J sc performance of the PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. The active layer morphologies: This refers to the physical and structural properties of the active layer in the PffBBn : PC71BM - based devices.
2. J sc performance: This is a measure of the current density-voltage (J-V) characteristics of the devices. It is a property that describes the electrical performance of the devices.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. The active layer morphologies
2. The J sc performance.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. The active layer morphologies (structural properties of the active layer)
2. J sc performance (electrical property of the devices).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| The active layer morphologies |
| J sc performance |
